Here are some properly spaced tables.

| foooo | foooo | foooo | foooo |
| ----- | :---- | :---: | ----: |
| bar   | baz   |  bar  |   bar |

So is this one (the longest cell receives preference, not the first):

| foo   | foo   |  foo  |   foo |
| ----- | :---- | :---: | ----: |
| baaar | baaaz | baaar | baaar |
